price: Dan jika kamu menginginkan Allah dan Rasul-Nya dan negeri akhirat, maka sesungguhnya Allah menyediakan pahala yang besar bagi siapa yang berbuat baik diantara kamu.
arabic: وَإِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدۡنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلۡمُحۡسِنَٰتِ مِنكُنَّ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kuntunna turid'na al-laha warasūlahu wal-dāra al-ākhirata fa-inna al-laha aʿadda lil'muḥ'sināti minkunna ajran ʿaẓīman
